post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests.

get.description: Get a specific department by ID. Superuser only.

delete.description:
Delete a department. Superuser only.
Cannot delete departments that contain users, especially administrators.

get.description:
Check if a department can be safely deleted.
Returns detailed information about deletion eligibility.

Retrieve images. Publicly accessible.

get.description:

This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.

This endpoint is public for direct linking.
